{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:25.000

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = 26th is the anniversary of the release of Abbey Road, arguably the Beatles' best record.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:10.000
    | text      = Almost too perfect.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.000

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:13.000
    | text      = It is too perfect.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.000
    | text      = And it felt false for me as a person because I kind of like the Beatles, but as a kid,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:17.000
    | text      = I wasn't allowed to listen to music that my parents construed as being inspired by drugs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:22.000
    | text      = I was hit with the switch and not allowed to listen to the Beatles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:27.000
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:28.000
    | text      = I gained appreciation for the Beatles' catalog through Beatles Rock Band.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:34.000
    | text      = And I'll probably never live down the moment when me and my buddies, Nicky Gifts and Swearingin
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:38.000
    | text      = were playing a few songs and Yesterday came on and I recognized that song, but I had no
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.000
    | text      = idea it was by the Beatles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.000
    | text      = My dad let me listen to that, but he kept the little secret that it was the Beatles
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.000
    | text      = from me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:50.000
    | text      = That is one of the weirdest things I've ever heard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:53.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.000
    | text      = Anyway, I couldn't in good conscience do an episode where I pretended to love the Beatles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:57.000
    | text      = If I were going to talk about British music, it needed to be something I truly loved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.000
    | text      = And as far as I'm concerned, there's only two options.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:05.000
    | text      = Sorry.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:06.000
    | text      = Commonwealth country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:07.000
    | text      = It's basically the same thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:08.000
    | text      = It's the first option, Phil Collins.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.000
    | text      = He's had a career full of hits, both solo and with Genesis, but what really put him
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:17.000
    | text      = over the top is he did that cover of Home with Bone Thugs and Harmony.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:21.000
    | text      = Was that it?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:23.000
    | text      = Take, take me home.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.000
    | text      = That was the one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:25.000
    | text      = That was the one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:26.000
    | text      = Put him over the top.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:27.000
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:28.000
    | text      = Alright.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.000
    | text      = There is nothing cooler than seeing old man Phil Collins in a music video nodding along

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.000
    | text      = See, I always felt like his lasting legacy will just be, choo choo, choo choo, choo choo,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Just doing that at a bar.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:48.000
    | text      = Whenever we've forgotten all music, that will be the break that ends it.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:51.000
    | text      = Like at the end of time, as everything is crushed down into a white hole.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.000
    | text      = Yep.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:58.000
    | text      = Hey man, you know.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.000
    | text      = Yeah, that's physics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.000
    | text      = And that'll be what plays.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:01.000
    | text      = As the earth explodes, it's just that drum beat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
